scripts.install-ci: echo '# No additional dependencies need to be installed in ci mode'
scripts.install-dev: echo '# Installing all libraries on host for code editor support. TODO how to minimize as --only=dev affects devDepencies also?' && npm run install-all
scripts.install-all: npm-run-all install-all:admin install-all:bot install-all:client install-all:function install-all:server install-all:worker
scripts.install-all:admin: cd admin && npm install && npm run flow-install
scripts.install-all:bot: cd bot && npm install && npm run flow-install
scripts.install-all:client: cd client && npm install && npm run flow-install
scripts.install-all:function: cd function && npm install && npm run flow-install
scripts.install-all:server: cd server && npm install && npm run flow-install
scripts.install-all:worker: cd worker && npm install && npm run flow-install
scripts.lint: npm-run-all --parallel lint:admin lint:bot lint:client lint:function lint:server lint:worker
scripts.unit: npm-run-all --parallel unit:admin unit:bot unit:client unit:function unit:server unit:worker
scripts.unit:admin: taito run: admin -- npm run unit
scripts.unit:client: taito run: client -- npm run unit
scripts.unit:server: taito run: server -- npm run unit
scripts.test: npm-run-all --parallel test:admin test:bot test:client test:function test:server test:worker
scripts.info:local: taito secrets | grep 'Showing\|PASSWORD'; echo; echo 'TODO: add local users to package.json (username/password)'
scripts.info:dev: taito secrets:dev | grep -A 1 'Showing\|user.'; echo; echo 'TODO: add dev users to package.json (username/password)'
scripts.info:test: taito secrets:test | grep -A 1 'Showing\|user.'; echo; echo 'TODO: add test users to package.json (username/password)'
scripts.scan: echo 'Linting is executed in Dockerfiles during build' && echo 'TODO: execute code analysis here?'
scripts.docs: echo TODO: generate docs in package.json
scripts.contacts-development: cat PROJECT.md | sed -n -e '/^## Development.*$/,/^#.*$/{ /^## Development.*$/d; /^#.*$/d; p; }'
scripts.contacts-maintenance: cat PROJECT.md | sed -n -e '/^## Maintenance.*$/,/^#.*$/{ /^## Maintenance.*$/d; /^#.*$/d; p; }'
scripts.precommit: echo 'SKIP: Skipping linting on commit since we are already continuously linting during development.'
scripts.prepush: echo 'NOTE: Running prepush inside taito container' && echo taito taito-prepush
